name: HMA_DESCRIPTION
description: This table holds relevant metadata about user macros. This includes SmartBlock macros and SmartForm macros, differentiated by type (I HMA 70).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the macro.

columns.name: RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name of a macro.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name of a macro.
